about_the_game:
Throw on your cosmetics and host your own custom named arcade lobby with your friends and others online with the Minigame Game Arcade Pass!

Cosmetics

Unlocked your favorite cosmetic or just want to show off your achievements to your friends and other players online? With the Arcade Pass you can equip any cosmetic you've unlocked through challenges and achievements! Equip it even if you achieved it prior to getting the pass!

Host your own custom named arcade lobby!

Want to compete in a collection of minigames of your own choosing with friends and other players? Want to make it easier to find those players and broadcast your own rules? Customize your arcade lobby's name to the world with the Arcade Pass!

(Bots are not available in all minigames but more are being added as we continue to update the game!)

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon Violence, Weapons, Player Generated Content (In-game chat, voice chat, and Steam community lobbies and avatars)
